meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or caused by fungi.
meanings.sent1: The fungous growth on the tree was green and fuzzy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the fungous infection on the plant.
meanings.sent3: The fungous smell in the forest made the hikers giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a colorful fungous garden.
meanings.sent5: The fungous texture of the mushroom was slimy and strange.

meanings.sent1: The gardener sprayed fungous on the roses to prevent disease.
meanings.sent2: She researched different types of fungous for her biology project.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a touch of fungous to the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent4: The city was a bustling hub of ideas, a fungous of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The fungous in the forest formed a magical fairy ring.
